sys_metadata_link.payload: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="09ff3d105f231000b12e3572f2b4775d" table="x_415531_rapid_ato_ars_3_1"> <x_415531_rapid_ato_ars_3_1 action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"> <active>true</active> <activity_due/> <additional_assignee_list/> <approval>not requested</approval> <approval_history/> <approval_set/> <ars_id display_value="ARS 3.1">43903e93dbcd1010280df36f299619aa</ars_id> <assessment_methods_and_objects>Systems processing, storing, or transm</assessment_methods_and_objects> <assessment_objective>Systems processing, storing, or transmitting PII (to include PHI):  Determine if there are adequate procedures for handling privacy related inquiries and complaints.</assessment_objective> <assigned_to/> <assignment_group/> <assurance/> <baseline>High; Moderate; Low</baseline> <business_duration/> <business_service/> <calendar_duration/> <close_notes/> <closed_at/> <closed_by/> <cmdb_ci/> <comments/> <comments_and_work_notes/> <company/> <contact_type/> <contract/> <control_definition>Systems processing, storing, or transmitting PII (to include PHI):  The organization implements a process for receiving and responding to complaints, concerns, or questions from individuals about the organizational privacy practices.</control_definition> <control_family display_value="Individual Participation and Redress">9787bdfcdb211010280df36f29961942</control_family> <control_name>Complaint Management</control_name> <control_number>IP-04</control_number> <control_type>Mandatory</control_type> <correlation_display/> <correlation_id/> <delivery_plan/> <delivery_task/> <description/> <due_date/> <escalation>0</escalation> <expected_start/> <follow_up/> <group_id>IP-04</group_id> <group_list/> <high>true</high> <impact>3</impact> <implementation_standards/> <knowledge>false</knowledge> <location/> <low>true</low> <made_sla>true</made_sla> <moderate>true</moderate> <number>ARSC0011271</number> <opened_at>2020-06-19 13:21:33</opened_at> <opened_by display_value="System Administrator">6816f79cc0a8016401c5a33be04be441</opened_by> <order/> <parent/> <priority>3</priority> <reassignment_count>0</reassignment_count> <reference_policy>CFR: 45 C.F.R. ยง164.530 (d); OMB Memo: M-17-12, M-08-09; OMB Circular A-130: 7.g.</reference_policy> <rejection_goto/> <related_controls>AR-6, IP-3</related_controls> <service_offering/> <short_description/> <sla_due/> <standard>NIST-800</standard> <state>1</state> <supplemental_guidance>Guidance for systems processing, storing, or transmitting PII (to include PHI):  Establishing a complaint management process ensures complaints are addressed in a timely manner and provides an avenue for individuals to participate in government activities that may impact privacy. Information received from complaints provides external input regarding organizational privacy and security practices which may improve processes and systems involved in collection, use, and maintenance of personally identifiable information (PII).Complaints, concerns, and questions from individuals can serve as a valuable source of external input that ultimately improves operational models, uses of technology, data collection practices, and privacy and security safeguards. Organizations provide complaint mechanisms that are readily accessible by the public, include all information necessary for successfully filing complaints (including contact information for the Senior Official for Privacy (SOP) or other official designated to receive complaints), and are easy to use. Organizational complaint management processes include tracking mechanisms to ensure that all complaints received are reviewed and appropriately addressed in a timely manner.</supplemental_guidance> <sys_class_name>x_415531_rapid_ato_ars_3_1</sys_class_name> <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by> <sys_created_on>2020-06-19 13:21:33</sys_created_on> <sys_domain>09ff3d105f231000b12e3572f2b4775d</sys_domain> <sys_domain_path>!!!/!!!/</sys_domain_path> <sys_id>1f87bdfcdb211010280df36f29961949</sys_id> <sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count> <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by> <sys_updated_on>2020-06-19 13:21:33</sys_updated_on> <task_for/> <time_worked/> <upon_approval>proceed</upon_approval> <upon_reject>cancel</upon_reject> <urgency>3</urgency> <user_input/> <variables/> <watch_list/> <wf_activity/> <work_end/> <work_notes/> <work_notes_list/> <work_start/> </x_415531_rapid_ato_ars_3_1> </record_update>
